lead_paragraph: HILDRETH--Ronald Budd, of Montauk, passed away at his home on June 21. A partner at Baker Botts, formerly Brumbaugh, Graves, Donohue and Raymond, he was an adjunct professor at St. John's. He was an 11th generation Hildreth from Southampton, survived by his wife of 57 years, Joan Cashman, five children and 15 grandchildren. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  HILDRETH, RONALD BUDD
